modName: Farmer Armored Clothes of Setvi - Skyrim
summary:
Tired to be the Chosen One?
Add a new armor set, the Farmer set (light armor, better than leather).
If you're like me and want to play like a normal citizen or a commoner.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#38761d][b][size=5]Tired to be the Chosen One?
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Add a new armor set, the Farmer set (light armor, better than leather).
[/size][/b][b][size=5]If you're like me and want to play like a normal citizen or a commoner.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]With this stuff, you can also play like a:
[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Acrobat
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Adventurer
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Agent
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Apothecary
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Archer
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Assassin
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Bandit
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Bard
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Beggar
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Blade
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Citizen
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Farmer
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Fletcher
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Food Vendor
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Healer
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Lumberjack
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Mercenary
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Nightblade
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Spellsword
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Pawnbroker
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Pilgrim
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Prisoner
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Ranger
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Rogue
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Scout
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Spell Vendor
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Spellsword
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Tailor
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Thief
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Witchblade
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Witchhunter.

[/size][/b][b][size=5]More to come if you have some idea.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]If you have roleplay idea, please submit your idea in the comment/forum area.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]I've made this mod for personal use, but I want to share it with you.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]The journey begins here, normal Dovahkiin.

[/size][/b][b][size=5]This light armor stats are better than leather.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]You can craft/upgrade/enchant this armor.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]No perk or no DLC required.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]I've put one set of this armor in the entrance of the Riverwood Inn on a knapsack.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][size=5]In the next few days, I maybe start in a new job.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Maybe I'm not be able to play at Skyrim/make/update/mod for a while.
Sorry for my bad English.
[/size][/b][b][size=5]Thanks for all, Setvi.

My others mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2764642/?tb=mods&pUp=1]SETVI's account User Files.[/url]

"I could not get past flawless."
"The only in gave solution I found was to have a peerless fortify smithing ring and necklace and drink a blacksmiths elixir potion. Then I could get the flawless things up to legendary."

- Thanks to [/size][/b][/color][color=#38761d][size=5][b]Carbamoylase[/b][/size][/color][b][size=5] [color=#38761d]for the solution.

[/color][/size][/b][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/size][/b][/center][center][color=#38761d][b][size=5]
